summary: wBAN - Wrap your BAN - wBAN is Wrapped Banano. It's available on BSC, Polygon, Fantom, Ethereum, and Arbitrum. You can swap with other crypto, swap from BAN to wBAN to your preferred crypto or vice-versa, earn some wBAN by providing liquidity to pools, and learn DeFi without risking much of your hard-earned BAN.
